news.title: Gentoo Linux T-shirts, caps, mugs, and CDS. Oh, my!

body.p:
Cafepress.com
is now offering exceptionally spiffy Gentoo Linux T-shirts, caps, and mugs.
IndiaInfoTech.org is selling Gentoo 1.2 CDs at Rs 50/- ($1 US)
ComputerHelperGuy is selling Gentoo 1.2 CDs and donating $1 per sale to Gentoo.
